imagestabilizersystem: Yes (lens shift-type), Approx. 4-stop (except with Touch Shutter). Intelligent IS
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or Touch AF frame)
stillimagetype: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.3 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
shutterspeed: 1 – 1/4000 sec. (factory default), 15 – 1/4000 sec. (total range – varies by shooting mode)
